import{initializeApp}from'firebase/app';import{getDatabase,ref,push,onValue,set}from"firebase/database";import Header from'../Header';import React from'react';import{ReactDOM}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var getformdata2=function getformdata2(e){e.preventDefault();var email=document.querySelector("#email").value;var password=document.querySelector("#password").value;console.log(email,password);if(email!==""&&password!==""){document.querySelector("#data").innerHTML="waiting For Network";getDatabasedata(email,password);document.querySelector("#email").value="";document.querySelector("#password").value="";}else{document.querySelector("#data").innerHTML="incorrect username && password";}};var getDatabasedata=function getDatabasedata(email,password){console.log("passed data "+email,password);var db=getDatabase();var starCountRef=ref(db,'users/');onValue(starCountRef,function(snapshot){snapshot.forEach(function(element){var data=element.val();if(data.email===email&&data.password===password){console.log("you are now Logged In as "+data.firstname);sessionStorage.setItem("name",data.firstname);sessionStorage.setItem('email',data.email);sessionStorage.setItem("lastname",data.lastname);sessionStorage.setItem("SOO",data.SOO);sessionStorage.setItem("age",data.Age);sessionStorage.setItem("jobtype",data.jobtype);sessionStorage.setItem("pnumber",data.pnumber);window.location.href="/Dashboard";console.log(data.firstname);//  insertdata_dashboard();
}else{console.log("incorrect password or email.");document.querySelector("#data").innerHTML="incorrect password or email.";document.querySelector("#data").innerHTML="incorrect password or email.";}});});};var submit2=document.querySelector("#sumbit_button_l");function Login(){window.onload=function load(){var logologo=document.querySelector("#logo-logo");console.log(logologo);logologo.style.display="none";};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{name:"Login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{textAlign:'center'},children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Submit",id:"submit_button_l",onClick:getformdata2,style:{padding:"8px",margin:"8px",color:"white",border:"1px solid green",background:"green",borderRadius:"8px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"data",children:" "})]})});}export default Login;
